General.Name: Gamatronic Electronic Industries Ltd
General.Description: Gamatronic Electronic Industries Ltd., a power system company, develops, manufactures, constructs, markets, and sells uninterruptible power supply (UPS) power units in Israel. Its products include UPS systems consisting of battery cabinet, control and management, industrial, marine, medical grade, military, SOHO, and modular online three phase UPS systems, as well as UPS repair services; and power supply units, such as HPS power supplies, telecom rectifiers, DC to AC inverters, and voltage converters. The company also provides three phase transformers; and automatic voltage stabilizers comprising static voltage regulators to protect electrical equipment from mains power surges and brown-outs; GSTS and STSW static switches; GTSI industrial UPS and inverters; and emergency lighting systems. In addition, it offers modular DC to DC, and modular AC to DC converters. It also exports its products to approximately 80 countries. Gamatronic Electronic Industries Ltd. was founded in 1970 and is headquartered in Jerusalem, Israel.
